text: Tara ki ara kichura apeksa kare ora parinama chara? Yedina era parinama asabe, yara era age eti abahela karechila tara balabe -- ''amadera prabhura rasulagana niscaya'i satya niye esechilena. Amadera jan'ya kono suparisakari ache ki? Tara tabe amadera jan'ya suparisa karuka, athaba amara ki pratyabrtta hate pari yena amara ya karatama tara biparita kichu karate pari?’’ Tara alabat tadera antara‌tma hariyeche, ara tadera theke bidaya niyeche se'isaba yadera tara udbhabana karechila.
